title: Activities: Viewing Activity History
body:
Activities: Viewing Activity History¶

Activities keeps a chronological record of actions and interactions between users within your organization (Refer here to view those of all organizations).
Each activity has a user and action-based description of the interaction.
In addition to this description, the time the interaction took place and the app icon with which the action is associated are displayed.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Team

  3. Click Activities

  4. Click an activity to view the product of the action

    • If you do not have permission to access the content, a Forbidden message will be displayed
toc: • Activities: Viewing Activity History
